name: NSMenu.Properties
desc: These constants are used as a bitmask for specifying a set of menu or menu item properties, and are contained by the propertiesToUpdate property.

items.name: static var propertyItemAttributedTitle: NSMenu.Properties
items.desc: The menu item’s attributed string title.

items.name: static var propertyItemEnabled: NSMenu.Properties
items.desc: Whether the menu item is enabled or disabled.
